Comments for the Award Task Template
This is a numeric field for Occurs on Year Numbe
A boolean flag indicating whether or not the award task occurs on final award year.
A boolean flag indicating whether or not the award task occurs on every award year.
A boolean flag indicating whether or not the award task has no recurrence.

Award_Task_Template_Due_Date_Offset_Data.description: Reference to Award Task Template Date Offset
The occurrence before/after anchor date and start/end of specified are relative to award schedule life.
The occurrence before/after anchor date and start/end of specified are relative to award contract period.
The occurrence before/after anchor date and start/end of specified are relative to award schedule period.
The occurrence before/after anchor date and start/end of specified are relative to posting interval

Award_Task_Template_Data.description: Due Date Offset Data such as number of months, number of days, occurrence, occurs before or after anchor date.
